response.original_title: နေရောင်မှိုင်းပျ အိမ်ပြန်ည
response.overview: Nay Yaung (21), a small town boy working in Yangon, wants to run away with his girlfriend Saung Oo (20) in order to save her from her abusive family and difficult city-life, and starts a new life. But he does not have enough money. At the same time, his mother from the conflict-affected home town is getting very ill. Nay Yaung needs to do something in order to solve these problems.
response.title: Way Back Home

titles.title: နေရောင်မှိုင်းပျ အိမ်ပြန်ည
